pageProduct.name: Thursday Plantation Tea Tree Ointment 30g
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Thursday Plantation Tea Tree Antiseptic Ointment protects from dirt & bacteria.

This natural antiseptic protects minor wounds such as gravel rash, abrasions, cuts and helps soothe dry and inflamed skin conditions.

Size: 30g

KEY FEATURES

• Forms a protective barrier.
• For minor wounds
• Protects from dirt & bacteria
• With 100% pure Tea Tree oil, Australia's natural antiseptic

Warnings

If symptoms persist, consult your healthcare professional.

CAUTION

For external use only. Keep out of reach of children. Skin patch test prior to use, if sensitivity occurs discontinue use. Avoid contact with eyes. Do not use if seal at mouth of tube is broken.

Ingredients

Active Ingredients: Melaleuca Oil 50mg/g.

Directions

Ensure skin is clean and dry before application. Apply a thin layer directly to the affected area, two to three times daily as needed. Cover with a dressing if required.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 25°C.

Storage Temperature: Below 25°C.

RECYCLABLE INFORMATION

Remove cap and recycle.

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes

Recycling Code: 2 PEHD or HDPE
